description.en: Discover NFTs owned by a Solana wallet using the Solana JSON RPC API. Filters SPL token accounts to NFT-like assets (0 decimals, amount > 0) to provide a quick NFT overview.
description.de: Entdecke NFTs, die von einer Solana-Wallet gehalten werden, ueber die Solana JSON RPC API. Filtert SPL-Tokenkonten zu NFT-aehnlichen Assets (0 Dezimalstellen, Menge > 0) fuer einen schnellen NFT-Ueberblick.

description.en: The wallet address to list NFTs for.
description.de: Die Wallet-Adresse, fuer die NFTs gelistet werden.

description.en: Optional Solana commitment level (processed, confirmed, finalized).

output.NFTS: transform:() => { const accounts = results.TOKEN_ACCOUNTS || []; return accounts.filter((account: any) => { const info = account.account?.data?.parsed?.info; const tokenAmount = info?.tokenAmount; if (!tokenAmount) return false; const amount = Number(tokenAmount.amount || 0); const decimals = tokenAmount.decimals ?? 0; return amount > 0 && decimals === 0; }).map((account: any) => { const info = account.account?.data?.parsed?.info || {}; const tokenAmount = info.tokenAmount || {}; return { mint: info.mint || null, owner: info.owner || null, amount: tokenAmount.amount || '0', tokenAccount: account.pubkey || null }; }); }
output.NFTS_SUMMARY: transform:() => { const nfts = results.NFTS || []; return nfts.slice(0, 10); }
